mapper.select: select pid, pname, english, vid, mustproperty as mustProperty, isChinese from itemproperty where cid = #{cid}
select pid, pname, english, vid, mustproperty as mustProperty, isChinese from itemproperty where pid = #{pid} and cid = #{cid}
select pid, pname, english, isChinese, mustproperty, vid from itemproperty where pid = #{id} limit 1
select distinct(pid), pname, english, isChinese, mustproperty, vid from itemproperty limit #{numBegin}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update itemproperty set pname = #{pname}, english = #{english} where pid = #{pid}
